title: Episode 19: Internships and the Volunteer Center of Brown County
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this episode Dr. Ryan Martin and Dr. Kate Burns talk with Will Vogt, current student and podcast regular, and Michael Schwartz-Oscar, Executive Director of the Volunteer Center of Brown County (http://www.volunteergb.org/).  Michael discusses the value of volunteering, the various programs offered through the center, and how UWGB Psychology and Human Development students can get involved in an internship through the center.  Learn more about the internship match program at: http://blog.uwgb.edu/uwgbpsych/hudpsych-volunteer-center-internship-matching-program/
itunes:subtitle: In this episode Dr. Ryan Martin and Dr. Kate Burnâ€¦
